headline: 3 Reasons VRSN is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: While the S&P 500 is up 34.7% since April 2025, VeriSign (currently trading at $268.50 per share) has lagged behind, posting a return of 14%. This was partly due to its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
